result.description: Micro4Nano website will be most important communication tool, representing the primary communication platform at all levels (scientific & industrial community, general public, etc.). result.title: Design of topological waveguides
result.description: Layout and report of the designs of topological waveguides for photons, phonons and combination of the two. The report will focus on design features that limit propagation losses, and create hybrid photon-phonon systems, including those where both are topologically protected and where topological photonic waveguides overlap with phononic bandgaps. Layouts for fabrication (dxf files) will be included. These designs will provide input to Task 1.4 in WP1 for device fabrication. The report will also include fabrication details.
